page.title: 03GAMES WE PLAY
page.content: { POOH STICKS} Pooh sticks is a game that you play with friends. You have to go somewhere were there is a river with a bridge. You get a stick each and throw it in the water in ith same place. The stic that comes out first on the other side is the winner. {RED LETTER} I like the game called "Red Letter", I play it quite a lot. You need about 6 people, one to call out the letters. What you have to do is get from one end of the playground to the other, you can take a step each time the caller sayes a letter in your name but if you move on the {RED LETTER}(which you decide on at the start) you have to go back to the biginning. you must not move on the {RED LETTER}even if it is in your name. {
